title: Hand Made Graphics
content:
I am looking for a specific book which I believe to be named “The new made hand graphics”

The cover had type on it that resmebled a hand. Cannot remember the author.

Any help would be appriciated.

 [‹ Wanted: Chiseled but Elegant](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119061658/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37324 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tschichold and Renner ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119061658/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37321 "Go to next forum topic")
author: NEM

comments.content:
This is one I’ve been thinking about picking up.
